com.sanderjurgens.volvis.visualization
 

  • Uses of RenderingTab in com.sanderjurgens.volvis.visualization

    Methods in com.sanderjurgens.volvis.visualization that return RenderingTab
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    protected RenderingTab
    RaycastingRenderer.getRenderingTab()
    Returns the tab containing the rendering settings.
    Constructors in com.sanderjurgens.volvis.visualization with parameters of type RenderingTab
    Modifier
    Constructor
    Description
     
    AverageRenderer(String name, RenderingTab renderingTab)
    Constructs a renderer to visualize the volume based on ray casting to compute the average intensity projection.
     
    CenterRenderer(String name, RenderingTab renderingTab)
    Constructs a renderer to visualize the volume based on ray casting to compute a centered slice of the volume.
     
    IsovalueSurfacesRenderer(String name, RenderingTab renderingTab, TransferFunctionTab transferTab)
    Constructs a renderer to visualize the volume based on ray casting and a transfer function to compute isovalue contour surfaces.
     
    MarchingCubesRenderer(String name, RenderingTab renderingTab)
    Constructs a renderer to visualize the volume based on the marching cubes algorithm.
     
    MaximumRenderer(String name, RenderingTab renderingTab)
    Constructs a renderer to visualize the volume based on ray casting to compute the maximum intensity projection.
     
    RaycastingRenderer(String name, RenderingTab renderingTab)
    Constructs a renderer to visualize the volume based on a ray casting algorithm to render a 2D image of the volume.
     
    TransferFunctionRenderer(String name, RenderingTab renderingTab, TransferFunctionTab transferTab)
    Constructs a renderer to visualize the volume based on ray casting and a transfer function to compute the colored intensity projection.
     
    Visualization(com.jogamp.opengl.awt.GLCanvas cv, RenderingTab rt)
    Constructs a visualization to display the volume on the canvas.
